product_name: Columbia Radiator 40 Semirectangular II Sleeping Bag - Right - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The thermal reflective lining of the Radiator 40 Semirectangular II Sleeping Bag traps body heat for efficient, lightweight warmth, helping you stay cozy and comfortable on summer camping trips.
